word:
My brethren, in the name of the Lord I counsel you to seek him by repentance and confession. Let your sins of omission and commission go beforehand to judgment, that pardon may be written against your names, that you may 
                                                                           409
be accounted worthy to stand before him when he shall appear. 


                    (Signed) Ellen G. White 

(Written May 30, 1895; copied May 6, 1896.) Recopied, HER 

                                               -
